summary.description: A overall summary of the entire chat history until the most recent query, in as few lines as possible

sentiment.description: Return the sentiment of the review as positive, neutral or negative

name.description: The speaker's name, if available. Use null if the speaker is unidentified or not mentioned in the text.

term.description: The special or domain-specific word found in the text use null if unidentified

explanation.description: A short explanation of what the word or term means in this context

contextual_explanations.description: List of special terms used in the conversation with their brief explanations
